sources.title: Bordering on Bad Behavior | Full Action Movie | Bernard Curry | Tom Sizemore
sources.description:
Bordering on Bad Behavior - Three soldiers from different countries find themselves trapped in a military base in the Middle East.
2014.  Stars: Tom Sizemore, Oz Zehavi, Bernard Curry

metadata.Plot: Bordering on Bad Behavior is a politically incorrect comedy that entertains and enthralls the viewer into a strategic moment in history where wrong is right and right is wrong, and ultimately answers that age-old question: Is blood really thicker than water? And, if war kills, can weed heal!
metadata.Actors: Tom Sizemore, Oz Zehavi, Bernard Curry
